parameters.description: Specify which page to query.

get.description: Get person details by id.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify which page to query.

get.description:
Get the release date along with the certification for a movie or film. Release dates support different types: 1. Premiere
2. Theatrical (limited)
3. Theatrical
4. Digital
5. Physical
6. TV
Get the credits (cast, crew and guest stars) for a TV episode.

Get the images that belong to a movie or film. Querying images with a `language` parameter will filter the results. If you want to include a fallback language (especially useful for backdrops) you can use the `include_image_language` parameter. This should be a comma seperated value like so: `include_image_language=en,null`.
Search for a TV show.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify which page to query.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Pass a text query to search. This value should be URI encoded.

parameters.name: include_adult
parameters.description: Choose whether to inlcude adult (pornography) content in the results.

get.description: Get the TV episode details by id.
Get the TV network logos by id.
Get the list of official genres for TV shows.
Search for movies or films.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Pass a text query to search. This value should be URI encoded.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify which page to query.

parameters.name: include_adult
parameters.description: Choose whether to inlcude adult (pornography) content in the results.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Specify a ISO 3166-1 code to filter release dates.

get.description: Discover movies or films by different types of data like average rating, number of votes, genres and certifications.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Specify a ISO 3166-1 code to filter release dates.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Choose from one of the many available sort options.

parameters.name: certification_country
parameters.description: Used in conjunction with the certification filter, use this to specify a country with a valid certification.

parameters.name: certification
parameters.description: Filter results with a valid certification from the 'certification_country' field.

parameters.name: certification.lte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a certification that is less than or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: certification.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies that have a certification that is greater than or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: include_adult
parameters.description: A filter and include or exclude adult movies.

parameters.name: include_video
parameters.description: A filter to include or exclude videos.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page of results to query.

parameters.name: primary_release_year
parameters.description: A filter to limit the results to a specific primary release year.

parameters.name: primary_release_date.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a primary release date that is greater or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: primary_release_date.lte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a primary release date that is less than or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: release_date.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a release date (looking at all release dates) that is greater or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: release_date.lte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a release date (looking at all release dates) that is less than or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: with_release_type
parameters.description: Release types map to the same values found on the movie release date method.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: A filter to limit the results to a specific year (looking at all release dates).

parameters.name: vote_count.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a vote count that is greater or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: vote_count.lte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a vote count that is less than or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: vote_average.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a rating that is greater or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: vote_average.lte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies that have a rating that is less than or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: with_cast
parameters.description: A comma separated list of person ID's. Only include movies or films that have one of the ID's added as an actor.

parameters.name: with_crew
parameters.description: A comma separated list of person ID's. Only include movies or films that have one of the ID's added as a crew member.

parameters.name: with_people
parameters.description: A comma separated list of person ID's. Only include movies or films that have one of the ID's added as a either a actor or a crew member.

parameters.name: with_companies
parameters.description: A comma separated list of production company ID's. Only include movies or films that have one of the ID's added as a production company.

parameters.name: with_genres
parameters.description: Comma separated value of genre ids that you want to include in the results.

parameters.name: without_genres
parameters.description: Comma separated value of genre ids that you want to exclude from the results.

parameters.name: with_keywords
parameters.description: A comma separated list of keyword ID's. Only includes movies or films that have one of the ID's added as a keyword.

parameters.name: without_keywords
parameters.description: Exclude items with certain keywords. You can comma and pipe seperate these values to create an 'AND' or 'OR' logic.

parameters.name: with_runtime.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies that have a runtime that is greater or equal to a value.

parameters.name: with_runtime.lte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies or films that have a runtime that is less than or equal to a value.

parameters.name: with_original_language
parameters.description: Specify an ISO 639-1 string to filter results by their original language value.

parameters.name: with_watch_providers
parameters.description: A comma or pipe separated list of watch provider ID's. Combine this filter with `watch_region` in order to filter your results by a specific watch provider in a specific region.

parameters.name: watch_region
parameters.description: An ISO 3166-1 code. Combine this filter with `with_watch_providers` in order to filter your results by a specific watch provider in a specific region.

parameters.name: with_watch_monetization_types
parameters.description: In combination with `watch_region`, you can filter by monetization type.

parameters.name: without_companies
parameters.description: Filter the results to exclude the specific production companies you specify here. `AND` / `OR` filters are supported.

get.description: Get a list of upcoming movies or films in theatres. This is a release type query that looks for all movies or films that have a release type of 2 or 3 within the specified date range. You can optionally specify a `region` prameter which will narrow the search to only look for theatrical release dates within the specified country.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify which page to query.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Specify a ISO 3166-1 code to filter release dates.

get.description: Search for companies.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Pass a text query to search. This value should be URI encoded.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify which page to query.

get.description: Discover TV shows by different types of data like average rating, number of votes, genres, the network they aired on and air dates.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Choose from one of the many available sort options.

parameters.name: air_date.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include TV shows that have a air date (by looking at all episodes) that is greater or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: air_date.lte
parameters.description: Filter and only include TV shows that have a air date (by looking at all episodes) that is less than or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: first_air_date.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include TV shows that have a original air date that is greater or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: first_air_date.lte
parameters.description: Filter and only include TV shows that have a original air date that is less than or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: first_air_date_year
parameters.description: Filter and only include TV shows that have a original air date year that equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page of results to query.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Used in conjunction with the air_date.gte/lte filter to calculate the proper UTC offset.

parameters.name: vote_average.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies that have a rating that is greater or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: vote_count.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include movies that have a rating that is less than or equal to the specified value.

parameters.name: with_genres
parameters.description: Comma separated value of genre ids that you want to include in the results.

parameters.name: with_networks
parameters.description: Comma separated value of network ids that you want to include in the results.

parameters.name: without_genres
parameters.description: Comma separated value of genre ids that you want to exclude from the results.

parameters.name: with_runtime.gte
parameters.description: Filter and only include TV shows with an episode runtime that is greater than or equal to a value.

parameters.name: with_runtime.lte
parameters.description: Filter and only include TV shows with an episode runtime that is less than or equal to a value.

parameters.name: include_null_first_air_dates
parameters.description: Use this filter to include TV shows that don't have an air date while using any of the "first_air_date" filters.

parameters.name: with_original_language
parameters.description: Specify an ISO 639-1 string to filter results by their original language value.

parameters.name: without_keywords
parameters.description: Exclude items with certain keywords. You can comma and pipe seperate these values to create an 'AND' or 'OR' logic.

parameters.name: screened_theatrically
parameters.description: Filter results to include items that have been screened theatrically.

parameters.name: with_companies
parameters.description: A comma separated list of production company ID's. Only include movies that have one of the ID's added as a production company.

parameters.name: with_keywords
parameters.description: A comma separated list of keyword ID's. Only includes TV shows that have one of the ID's added as a keyword.

parameters.name: with_watch_providers
parameters.description: A comma or pipe separated list of watch provider ID's.

parameters.name: watch_region
parameters.description: An ISO 3166-1 code.

parameters.name: with_watch_monetization_types
parameters.description: In combination with `watch_region`, you can filter by monetization type.

parameters.name: with_status
parameters.description:
Filter TV shows by their status. Returning Series: 0
Planned: 1
In Production: 2
Ended: 3
Cancelled: 4
Pilot: 5

parameters.name: with_type
parameters.description:
Filter TV shows by their type. Documentary: 0
News: 1
Miniseries: 2
Reality: 3
Scripted: 4
Talk Show: 5
Video: 6

parameters.name: without_companies
parameters.description: Filter the results to exclude the specific production companies you specify here. `AND` / `OR` filters are supported.
